page.title: 05Games boys play in Bacup
page.content: Most boys want to play football in their spare time but there are other games such as Tig_in,Tig_out, 21 Dares, Atom Bomb, Bulldogs and Kerby that we play. In{Kerby,}two people stand on the road kerb facing each other across the road. Each player throws a ball and tries to hit the opposite kerb. If he does he scores a point and has another throw. After 15 throws the one with the highest score is the winner.{ { {Atom Bomb}any number can play.They stand at least 2 metres apart. The ball is acting as an atom bomb and will explode if it is missed or touches the floor when thrown. Anyone missing or dropping the ball is out. The winner is the person left in at the end.
